column4: while upgrading to ubuntu 10.4, my system locked up, i had to power cycle, now X wont even load, what should i do?
that doesnt work.. what i need to do is finish the upgrade, can i do that from the command line?
yes, mid upgrade i had to power cycle because everything locked up
Give me a few I remember a command but I can't find it right now give me a few.

I'm running into an odd problem with sound, Amarok will play, for awhile FireFox didn't want to output sounds on Youtube I got the firefox sounds working by exiting amarok then reentering, but I still currently here no system sounds anyone have a suggestion?
actually someone said dist-upgrade, i'm doing that
i did apt-get, somenoe said to use aptitude, but apt-get is already going.. so i'll leave it, i dont think it matters?
